query.statement:
SELECT A.PSPID, B.BSTNK, A.DEPT, A.TEAM, A.MAKE_MM, A.WAERK, A.ERNAM, (SELECT X.NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0011 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.TEMNO = A.PERSON_NM) AS ERNAMNM,
SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.MR_NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR, A.TYPE, A.ACTION, A.GUBUN, (SELECT B.SAYU FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0402 AS B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.PSPID fetch first 1 rows only) AS CONTENT , CASE WHEN A.PSPID = D.PSPID THEN 'À¯' ELSE '¹«' END AS PLAN, TRIM(CHAR(INT(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.MAKE_MM )))) AS RNO, '' AS DEPT2, '' AS TEAM2, '' AS MAKF_DT, '' AS MAKT_DT
FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0401 AS A
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS C ON B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.ZZPJT_ID = C.POSID
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0403 AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.PSPID = D.PSPID
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MAKE_MM BETWEEN SUBSTR(#MAKF_DT#,1,6) AND SUBSTR(#MAKT_DT#,1,6)
AND A.DEPT = #DEPT#
AND A.TEAM = #TEAM#
